name: Super Mario on Scratch 6 Enlightened
description: I didn't made this game credit goes to DuckGoose9254 for this amazing mario scratch game: I'm just reuploading it so if something happened to scratch or his account this will be for reservation purposes. Here's the original game on scratch: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/727290948/ go play the scratch version or the turbowarp version https://turbowarp.org/727290948 if you already haven't. Also all rights go to Nintendo.
